alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Fisher; Haskell; Jones; Nolan; Shackelford; Taylor; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN HASKELL...NORTHERN CALLAHAN...JONES...NORTHERN NOLAN...SHACKELFORD...FISHER...NORTHERN TAYLOR AND SOUTHERN THROCKMORTON COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms near Roby to Merkel to Albany, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Sweetwater, Clyde, Stamford, Anson, Hamlin, Albany, Baird, Roscoe, Wylie, Merkel, Rotan, Tye, Roby, Hawley, Lueders, Trent, Moran, Woodson, and Putnam. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 229 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Callahan; Fisher; Haskell; Jones; Nolan; Shackelford; Taylor; Throckmorton
